meta.title: Ashapura Brass Industries - Precision Engineering Excellence
meta.description: Leading manufacturer of precision brass components for automotive, pneumatic, aerospace, and hydraulic applications

hero.title: Precision Brass Engineering Excellence
hero.subtitle: Manufacturing superior brass components for critical applications

items.title: Superior Quality
items.description: ISO 9001:2015 certified manufacturing processes ensuring consistent quality and reliability in every component.

items.title: 35+ Years Experience
items.description: Over three decades of expertise in precision brass machining and manufacturing complex components.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.description: State-of-the-art CNC machines and automated production lines for precision manufacturing.

aboutusintro.title: About Ashapura Brass Industries
aboutusintro.subtitle: Leading precision brass component manufacturer
aboutusintro.description: Established in 1985, Ashapura Brass Industries has been at the forefront of precision brass manufacturing, serving automotive, pneumatic, aerospace, and hydraulic industries with superior quality components and exceptional customer service.

expertise.title: Our Industry Expertise
expertise.subtitle: Specialized brass components for critical applications
expertise.description: We serve diverse industries with precision-engineered brass components that meet the highest quality standards.

sectors.name: Automotive Industry
sectors.description: High-precision brass components for automotive systems including engine parts and fuel delivery systems.

sectors.name: Electrical Industry
sectors.description: Precision electrical components including terminals, connectors, and switching elements.

sectors.name: Construction Industry
sectors.description: Durable brass fittings and hardware for construction and architectural applications.

sectors.name: Marine Industry
sectors.description: Corrosion-resistant brass components designed for marine and offshore applications.

sectors.name: Aerospace Industry
sectors.description: High-precision components meeting stringent aerospace quality and safety standards.

sectors.name: Industrial Machinery
sectors.description: Robust brass components for heavy machinery and industrial equipment applications.

sectors.name: HVAC Systems
sectors.description: Precision fittings and components for heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems.

sectors.name: Oil & Gas
sectors.description: High-pressure resistant components for oil and gas exploration and processing equipment.

items.name: Rajesh Kumar
items.content: Ashapura Brass Industries has consistently delivered high-quality components on time. Their precision and attention to detail is remarkable.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: We've been working with Ashapura for over 10 years. Their quality standards and customer service are exceptional.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Common questions about our products and services

items.question: What is the minimum order quantity?
items.answer: Our minimum order quantity varies by product complexity. For standard items, it's typically 100 pieces, while custom components may require higher quantities.

items.question: What are the typical lead times?
items.answer: Standard products: 2-3 weeks. Custom components: 4-6 weeks. Rush orders can be accommodated with additional charges.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Precision Excellence?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied clients who trust Ashapura Brass Industries for their precision manufacturing needs. Get started today.
